title: Personal Portfolio Website - Hrithik's Portfolio
description: A personal portfolio website built to showcase my projects, experience, and skills in a clean and structured way. The site focuses on responsive design, smooth navigation, and performance, with a modern UI that highlights my work and technical background clearly and effectively.

title: Budget Beast Motors – Website for luxury Used Car Dealership
description: A modern car dealership website showcasing premium and exotic vehicles with detailed listings, smooth navigation, and responsive design. Built using pure HTML and CSS, focusing on clean layouts, usability, and a premium look and feel.

title: RE:FLEX – Website for Luxury Resale Marketplace
description: A premium resale marketplace for verified luxury fashion items, focused on authenticity, transparency, and a smooth user experience. Features curated listings, condition-based pricing, and a minimal, responsive UI designed for seamless browsing and selling.
